pageContent: Objective: To compare the perioperative, functional and oncologic outcomes of patients with prostate cancer receiving laparoscopic radical prostatectomy (LRP) using three-dimensional (3D) versus two-dimensional (2D) imaging systems.

metaData.source:
Foundation for the integration of biologically based therapy in the management of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12886521/
